key_features.title: Strong, dynamic typing
key_features.content: Gdscript is strong and dynamically typed and supports gradual typing.

key_features.title: Cross platform
key_features.content: GDScript code can run wherever Godot runs, either on Windows, Linux, macOS, iOS, Android, the web and even consoles.

key_features.title: C++ bindings
key_features.content: C++ bindings allows for fast, low-level access to the engine's features.

key_features.title: Specialized types for game development
key_features.content: Specialized types for increased productivity and performance, when working with 2D and 3D games.

key_features.title: Garbage collection
key_features.content: Garbage collection is automatic and seamless, freeing you from manual memory management.

key_features.title: Threading support
key_features.content: Gdscript has built-in support for multithreading, allowing you to take advantage of multiple CPU cores.
